title: Minister of Foreign Affairs holds working session with his Turkish counterpart
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr Ramtane Lamamra, held Friday in Istanbul a working session with his Turkish counterpart, Mr Mevlut Cavusoglu, during which they expressed satisfaction regarding their economic cooperation, particularly in terms of trade and direct investments.

In addition, Mr Lamamra and Mr Cavusoglu exchanged views on the conclusions of the meeting of the foreign ministers participating in the 3rd Turkey-Africa Partnership Summit. The meeting's conclusions will be submitted to the summitDuring this summit, Prime Minister and Minister of Finance, Mr AÃ¯mene Benabderrahmane, will chair the Algerian delegation as representative of President of the Republic, Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune.Moreover, the two ministers discussed regional and international issues of common interest as well as the political and security situation in the Euro-Mediterranean region and current African issues.
